name: Spooky Dice
description:
Get your dice ready!

Explore the darkness and try to reach the exit guarded by the Dice King whilst meeting weird and quirky characters on your way out.

What can you expect from Spooky Dice?
  • Enjoyable combat based on dice
  • Multiple odd characters to beat
  • A quick game to beat in 15 minutes

This game was made in under a day for a gamejam, so please rate it if you have a moment to do so ;)

Will you be able to beat the darkness?
